subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY:
body:
how are you doing today and with you family, i didn't hear from you again,
please what is real going on, pleasewe need to hear from you so that i will
know what is holding you to send the $250 to complete this transaction with
you so please try and get back to me okay, i am waiting for your response,
thank you...

Finally, Here is the information on how you will send it you can go ahead
to WorldRemit office and tell them to help you and send the $250usd through
MTN mobile money Account with this information below:

Recievers name........... Achates Atreus
Country....................... Benin republic
City........... cotonou
Code..........+229
Telephone number.........57244969
Amount...........250usd

thanks for choosing UPS Delivering Service Company Ltd Benin,

Yours affectionately.

Mr.Vaskovich Vyacheslav Y
